name: A pale white gemstone
data: It decreases the users wisdom unbelievably much.
It increases the users intelligence phenomenally.
It decreases the users charisma impossibly much.
It has non-existent armour class for its type (non-existent in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration nicely.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'psionic efficiency'.
This item loses its magical powers somewhat slower than average.
It increases the users magical resistance somewhat.
It gives decent bonus to the skill 'art of telepathy'.
It decreases the users psionic resistance somewhat.
